main event: A witness observed an object with erratic movements in Centerville, Ohio, suspected to be Venus, but displaying characteristics unlike the planet.
interesting points: The object changed colors between white and yellow and was as bright as a planet., The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 10 minutes., A second object was reported to move across and then vanish., Witness reported a red flame appeared in the middle of the object., The object was described as metallic in appearance.
sighted object: one or two erratically moving objects with changing colors
witness description: The witness described the object as metallic and bright, similar to the appearance of Venus but located to the north.
